chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type

Goal:
forall F G : Family T, Included F G -> Included (FamilyUnion F) (FamilyUnion G)

Premises:
Family = fun T : Type => Ensemble (Ensemble T) : Type -> Type Arguments Family _%type_scope
Included = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => forall x : U, In B x -> In C x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Arguments Included {U}%type_scope
ZMicromega.F = fun (acc : BinNums.positive) (f : EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1) => BinPos.Pos.max acc (ZMicromega.max_var BinNums.xH (fst f)) : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1 -> BinNums.positive Arguments ZMicromega.F _%positive_scope
FamilyUnion : forall T : Type, Family T -> Ensemble T
family_union_intro : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> In (FamilyUnion F) x
family_intersection_intro : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (x : T), (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (FamilyIntersection F) x
FamilyIntersection_sind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyIntersection F t -> P t
FamilyIntersection_ind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyIntersection F t -> P t
Inductive FamilyIntersection (T : Type) (F : Family T) : Ensemble T := family_intersection_intro : forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (FamilyIntersection F) x Arguments FamilyIntersection [T]%type_scope Arguments family_intersection_intro [T]%type_scope _ [x] _%function_scope
FamilyUnion_ind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyUnion F t -> P t
FamilyUnion_sind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyUnion F t -> P t
Same_set = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => Included B C /\ Included C B : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Arguments Same_set {U}%type_scope
empty_family_union = Extensionality_Ensembles (FamilyUnion Empty_set) Empty_set (conj (fun (x : T) (H : In (FamilyUnion Empty_set) x) => match H in (FamilyUnion _ y) return (In Empty_set y) with | family_union_intro _ S0 x0 H0 _ => Empty_set_ind (Ensemble T) (fun _ : Ensemble T => In Empty_set x0) S0 H0 end) (fun (x : T) (H : In Empty_set x) => Empty_set_ind T (fun x0 : T => In (FamilyUnion Empty_set) x0) x H)) : FamilyUnion Empty_set = Empty_set
Strict_Included = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => Included B C /\ B <> C : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Arguments Strict_Included {U}%type_scope
ssreflect.locked_with_unlockable : forall T : Type, unit -> forall x : T, ssreflect.unlockable x
ssrbool.eq_mem = fun (T : Type) (mp1 mp2 : ssrbool.mem_pred T) => forall x : T, ssrbool.in_mem x mp1 = ssrbool.in_mem x mp2 : forall T : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T -> ssrbool.mem_pred T -> Prop Arguments ssrbool.eq_mem {T}%type_scope
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
ssrbool.prop_in1 : forall T1 : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T1 -> forall P : T1 -> Prop, ssreflect.phantom Prop (forall x : T1, P x) -> Prop
Intersection_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In B x -> In C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Intersection B C u -> P u
Intersection_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In B x -> In C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Intersection B C u -> P u
Union_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union B C u -> P u
Union_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union B C u -> P u
BinNat.N.ls'_ls'' : forall A : BinNums.N -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : BinNums.N, (forall n : BinNums.N, BinNat.N.le n z -> (forall m : BinNums.N, BinNat.N.le m z -> BinNat.N.le (BinNat.N.succ n) m -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : BinNums.N, (forall m : BinNums.N, BinNat.N.le m z -> BinNat.N.le n m -> A m) < -> (forall m : BinNums.N, BinNat.N.le m z -> BinNat.N.le (BinNat.N.succ n) m -> A m)
Ring_theory.ARsub_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rsub x y) (radd x (ropp y))
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
Field_theory.rsub_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall r : R, req (rsub r rO) r

Refl.make_conj : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop
ssreflect.locked_with : unit -> forall x : Type, x -> x

```coq
intros F G H.
unfold Included, FamilyUnion.
intros x H0.
apply family_union_intro.
intros S H1.
apply H.
Qed.```
